data.name: The Sanctum
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Korthaven, one of the wretched dark elven cities of the underground. When you're home one night you get a visit from an elf called Kim, who claims to be your slave. As it turns out, despite your orc-ish appearance, you're the bastard son of a dark elf lord. You've inherited most of his fortune and his slave. There is a condition to his fortune however...

The Sanctum is business simulator of the adult kind, in a modern world where elves, orcs and other races co-exist. Manage The Sanctum while training your girls, grow your business, explore Korthaven, and more in this RPG-Sim-Visual Novel hybrid.

Unlock Outfits & Customize Your Girls

Customize outfits to your liking for the employees at the sanctum with unlockables and more.

Explore Korthaven, meet its inhabitants, and grow your reputation

The game features a scene-based exploration system within Korthaven. Explore, meet its residents, take quests, learn the history of the realm, and more as you grow The Sanctum's success.

Discipline your girls, and unlock new skills and other acts

Train the resident employees of The Sanctum to unlock new acts and more, growing their abilities as you grow your own success.

Featuring Training, Act Customization, and more!

Unlock numerous acts and train your girls in them to your liking. They'll need to be experienced to bring you the most success.

Featuring dynamic animations, voice acting, and more!

All acts feature animation, voice acting, and more! These make these scenes more dynamic, and they can be replayed within the game's gallery as well.

Featuring an array of characters...

Who will you meet in Korthaven?

data.short_description: Welcome to Korthaven, one of the wretched dark elven cities of the underground. As it turns out, despite your orc-ish appearance, you're the bastard son of a dark elf lord. You've inherited most of his fortune and his slave. Manage your brothel, train your girls, and more in this VN-RPG-Sim hybrid.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains depictions of graphic sex, in drawn form. There are mentions of non-consensual sexual behavior, but depicted interactions between the main character and others will be consensual.

Additionally, the game handles mature topics and themes which include:

> (Fantasy) Slavery
> Strong language, alcohol
> BDSM, Bondage and Spanking 
> (Fantasy) Stripping and Sex Work

Depicted characters within the game are generally of fantasy races, such as orcs, elves, demons, or other such.
